author: cms-nanoAOD
body:
#### PR description:

This pull request contains the second (and, in our intentions, last) part of code updates for the NanoAODv6 campaign.

Summary of changes:

- added a couple of secondary vertex variables
- added selection bitmap for HEEP 7.0 electron ID
- added photons from muon FSR
- store mass of new physics particles in the generator
- updated jet ID to WINTER17PUPPI, SUMMER18, SUMMER18PUPPI versions

Depends on #28118.

#### PR validation:

Validated as usual within the nanoAOD integration setup.

A merged backport of #28103 and this PR will follow to 10_2_X and 10_6_X.
title: NanoAODv6 updates, part 2
